solution_line_template: The number of times Jason goes to the library per week is {jason_multiplier} * {william_per_week} = <<{jason_multiplier}*{william_per_week}={jason_per_week}>>{jason_per_week} times.
The number of times he goes to the library in {num_weeks} weeks is {jason_per_week} * {num_weeks} = <<{jason_per_week}*{num_weeks}={jason_total}>>{jason_total} times.
